text: Macintosh II Repair and Upgrade Secrets is a 264-page hardcover do-it-yourself book written by Larry Pina that describes how to repair and upgrade a Macintosh II personal computer. The book was first published in 1991 and is now out of print. It came with a diskette. ==See also== * Larry Pina Category:Computer books Category:Macintosh internals Category:Books by Larry Pina
title: Macintosh II Repair and Upgrade Secrets
